name: Bouncing Ball Game Prototype
description:
I started this game some months ago, but I didn't know what I wanted it to be at that time, so I forget it...

Until now!

Dash and bounce around the stages to finish them as fast as you can! Can you finish every stage with 5 stars? I hope so...

How to play: left click with the mouse on the character and drag the cursor to charge speed, release the button to dash. The further you drag, the faster the character goes.

Esc: Pause the game

R: Reload the stage

I'm publishing this prototype here to receive some feedback. I need people to play it and tell me how bad it is.
